item.title: hugo
item.description: Go Download # cd ~ # wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.9.linux-amd64.tar.gz # ls -l go* -rw-r--r--. 1 root root 102601309 Aug 25 07:44 go1.9.linux-amd64.tar.gz Install # tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.9.linux-amd64.tar.gz # ls -ld /usr/local/go/ drwxr-xr-x. 11 root root 265 Aug 25 06:51 /usr/local/go/ # vi ~/.bash_profile PATH=$PATH:$HOME/bin:/usr/local/go/bin # source ~/.bash_profile # go version go version go1.9 linux/amd64 Test # vi hello.go package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.
